frontmatter.title: Server-Swift Swift: Develop in Xcode, continuously verify in Docker
frontmatter.author: Chris Bailey

nodes.excerpt: Server-Side Swift: Develop in Xcode, continuously verify in DockerDue to the availability of the Swift Language Server Protocol (LSP) library, there are now more IDEs that you can use to develop server-side Swift applications, including VSCode on Linux. Undoubtedly though, most development is still done by using Xcode on macOS.While this is great in terms of support for the Swift language — and with the support for Swift Package Manager added in…
